name: zzzleepy
text: happy holidays!  watch out for pete's "criticism"

name: mr_pete
text: Man, hair like Nice Pete's is strange and particular in this day, but it is rude to call a man on it. It is also rude to threaten a man, even if he is rude back.

name: shinkusan
text: I liked that Pete, during the threatening process, appeared on the other side of Lyle. I suppose our perspective could have switched, but I like to think Pete is that powerful.

name: billyamericana
text: I'd love to get a Christmas card like that: all uncomfortable moment of impending violence, all hilarious facial hair of two dudes.

name: nurdbot
text: I could stop laughing at the last panel. Only Nice Pete can sass poor old Lye like that.

name: hassanoleary
text: That is not sass. A death threat is well beyond sass.

name: spinynorman
text:
Sass is more like chiding. Chiding is a few miles away from straight up threatening genital mutilation. You do not playfully pass such a comment among friends, but type it out on an old typewriter on yellowed paper and leave it on a doorstep accompanied by photos of the recipient with his eyes blacked out with marker.

Sass does not arrive in such a medium.

name: bixschmix
text: Extra points if one letter on the typewriter is extremely misaligned.

name: soticoto
text: I'm still absolutely convinced that "sass" is a synonym for HUUUUGGGGSS.

name: lugosh
text: I can stop laughing at a lot of things.

name: mattylite
text: Damnit, for a little I thought nobody noticed, and my mind was just swimming with potential snide comments.

name: qatipay
text: It is easy to forget that Lyle is the Achewood resident most sensitive to bad hair decisions! Now I've been reminded.

name: littlefatdog
text: are you referencing some previous strip?

name: qatipay
text: man, I couldn't remember what I was referencing for a second. I still don't remember if it was ever in a strip, but it was in Molly's blog: http://mollysanders.blogspot.com/2004_07_01_archive.html

name: qatipay
text:
oh here, here is a strip that brings up Lyle's haircuttery a little: http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uuaLHGX73

I knew there was at least one somewhere.

name: iseedeadpixels
text:
haircuttery
My feelings on this asset are: hilarious

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Junie B. Jones Is A Beauty Shop Guy.

name: lordpretzel
text: It is also a place of business.

name: vreeeee
text:
For those of us that don't live in California: Smogged means gettin' your car emissions-checked, and 'ese' means like homeboy; the person to whom you are talking. The More You Know (rainbow!)

Yeah I cold had to look these things up.

name: farqussus
text: SOME of us have heard Cypress Hill, thank you!

name: rowboat
text: I saw a movie with a Mexican in it once.

name: farqussus
text: was he a mexican, or a mexican't?

name: rowboat
text: He was stoned as shit so you tell me.

name: rowboat
text: I love A) stumbling upon comments which I don't remember writing at all and B) when those comments make no sense whatsoever. I love that.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Were you stoned as shit?  Tell me.

name: rowboat
text: No. I was stoned as fuck. Important difference.

name: gournal
text:
Earlier this week, my sister texted me when she was SO stoned. I assumed that she was stoned as fuck .
I asked her just how stoned she was and her reply was:

"animorphs"

name: gournal
text: I'm pretty sure that animorphs is the most stoned you can be.

name: rowboat
text: It's generational. I was a kid in the '80s, so Pee-Wee's Playhouse is the most stoned I can be, just as Howdy Doody is the most stoned my mom can be.

name: farqussus
text: Are you thinking of Animaniacs?

name: ssddr
text: Also note the chalkboard counting lyle's infractions, which grows loner as the arc progresses!

name: dougthehead
text: Any idea what Lyle's infractions are at this point in the story?  I'm guessing that one of them was for playing that one 'A' note at the beginning of their first song.  Not sure about the other one.

name: mangtastic
text: Maybe It's a "reverse countdown" where Lyle has three strikes, each check being a strike.  When his name is erased, then he will be Taken by Nice Pete.

name: mangtastic
text: Reading a few strips ahead, I see that the opposite of this is true.  Whoops!  Move along, now.  Nothing to see here.

name: nutmeg
text: 5 for the last two panels

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Connellingus, pitseleh, Darthemed)

name: woodenteeth
text: 'Welcome back from the record label negotiations...". Anybody else notice that with the new hair and the mic in hand that Pete is looking a lot like a news presenter bringing us back in from an ad break?

name: toughasnails001
text: When normal people say things like panel #5, they are using hyperbole to express how angry they are. Nice Pete, on the other hand, actually will cut you to rags and feed your salted dick to a dog.

name: jackparsons
text: Nah, if he's verbal about it don't worry. He either says it or does it in a fugue state.

name: rachel
text: I can only hope for something so golden this year

name: fosters
text: The last panel is Lyle's sense of self-preservation fighting its way back out of the whiskey-induced haze only to learn that Lyle has been making really bad decisions in its absence.

name: tekende
text: Nice Pete looks like Nick Cave here.

name: iseedeadpixels
text:
He does , chubby for noticing.
[IMGS OFF]

name: tekende
text:
Actually I was thinking more along the lines of
[IMGS OFF]

name: iseedeadpixels
text: God before I only half-saw it, now it's just... god.... A chubby

name: pinballchacha
text:
Aw, crap, you've all beaten me to it...
[IMGS OFF]

name: tekende
text: YES.

name: wozzeck
text:
As ah took the sickle up in ma kill-hand...

(For those not in the know, read And the Ass Saw the Angel .)

name: iseedeadpixels
text: Assetbar, it has been one month. I would like to chubby this again please.

name: drago25
text:
Is it insane that I didn't even notice anything strange about Pete's hair until Lyle mentioned it?

I'm afraid of Pete, I can't look that dude in the eye.

name: curranesque
text: Lyle has way creepier eyes. they're so... hollow.

name: captneko
text: Lyle finally got his holiday comeuppance for punching Philippe in the stomach.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: LAMARR! STOP IT!!

name: goro
text: OH my god I'd never laughed as hard as I have with this strip on my way through the archives.
